name: campion

one of a number of different wild plants with red, pink, or white flowers: Pink campion grew in the grass verge beside the road. They weeded out undesirable plants, such as red campions and bluebells.
More examplesFewer examplesIn the spring the lanes brim with campion, bluebells, primroses, violets, speedwell, and stitchwort.The cliffs rose sheer out of the sea, tufted with sea pink and white campion. Lychnis, or rose campion, has bright magenta flowers and soft, grey leaves.
